member.name: T:Gapotchenko.FX.ComponentModel.Disposable
member.summary: Provides methods for manipulating the disposable objects. May also server as a base class for internal disposable objects that implement a finalizer pattern, but is usually more suitable for that role.

member.name: M:Gapotchenko.FX.ComponentModel.Disposable.Clear``1(``0@)
member.summary: Tries to clear a disposable object at the specified reference by calling method and setting its value to null.

remarks.para: The method does not provide thread safety guarantees except memory model consistency. As a result, the method of a disposable object may be invoked several times when the method is called concurrently from multiple threads.

member.typeparam: The type of disposable object.
member.returns: true when the object has been disposed and the value cleared; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Gapotchenko.FX.ComponentModel.Disposable.Clear``1(``0@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tries to clear a disposable object at the specified reference by calling method and setting its value to null.

remarks.para: This method works in different thread safety modes depending on a value of parameter.

When is false, the method does not provide thread safety guarantees except memory model consistency. As a result, the method of a disposable object may be invoked several times when the method is called concurrently from multiple threads.

When is true, the method provides a publication and execution thread safety. As a result, the method of a disposable object is invoked exactly once even when the method is called concurrently from multiple threads.

member.typeparam: The type of disposable object.
member.param: true to make the method usable concurrently by multiple threads; false to make the method usable by one thread at a time.
member.returns: true when the object has been disposed and the value cleared; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Gapotchenko.FX.ComponentModel.Disposable.Clear``1(Gapotchenko.FX.Optional{``0}@)
member.summary: Tries to clear an optional disposable object at the specified reference by calling method and setting its value to .

remarks.para: The method does not provide thread safety guarantees.

member.typeparam: The type of disposable object.
member.param: The reference to an optional disposable value.
member.returns: true when the object has been disposed and the value cleared; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Gapotchenko.FX.ExceptionExtensions.IsCancellationException(System.Exception)

summary.para: Checks whether exception signifies a cancellation of a thread or task.
There is a predefined set of such exceptions: , , and .

member.name: M:Gapotchenko.FX.ExceptionExtensions.IsControlFlowException(System.Exception)

summary.para: Checks whether exception is intended to affect the control flow of code execution.
There is a predefined set of such exceptions: all the cancellation exceptions reported by , and .
The list can be semantically extended by deriving a custom exception from .

member.summary: Provides a way of diffusing bits from something with a limited input hash space. For example, many enums only have a few possible hashes, only using the bottom few bits of the code. member.returns: The diffused hash code.
